title: Kono Danshi, Uchuujin to Tatakaemasu. (This Boy Can Fight Aliens)
synopsis: All hope seems lost when the world is suddenly invaded by aliens. Earth's only defense is a small three-person team known as the Special Counter-Aliens Task Force, consisting of an anonymous director, the tyrannical Shiro, and the easygoing Arikawa.
related_anime: ['Kono Danshi, Mahou ga Oshigoto Desu.', 'Kono Danshi, Ningyo Hiroimashita.', 'Kono Danshi, Sekka ni Nayandemasu.']
voices: ['Kimura, Ryouhei', 'Toyonaga, Toshiyuki', 'Hirakawa, Daisuke', 'Hayami, Hideyuki', 'Han, Megumi', 'Shimozuma, Yoshiyuki']
staff: [['Yamamoto, Soubi', ['Director']], ['Shikata, Akiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Ledford, John', ['Executive Producer']], ['Williams, Janice', ['ADR Director']]]
